user_status_codes

1		user_inactive
2		user_active

user_role_codes

3		role_admin
4		role_user

user_source_codes

5		email
6		facebook
7		google+


success_codes

150		user logged out
151		password successfully reset
152		user successfully activated
153		user logged in
154		user registered successfully

error_codes

100		user is inactive
101		email id does not exist
102		user activation failed
103		user registration failed
104		user with same email exists
105		user login failed
